Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Support Force'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: "All right, let's review Support Force mandate.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member', 3: 'Efficiently manage on-field demands—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Support Force Member', 3: 'Ensure precise coordination, targeted support, and timely assistance—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Support Force Member', 3: 'Hold on to every spark of hope, no matter how small—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'The exhausted Support Force members mechanically recite their mandate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "...Why are we getting another mission already? I'm going to be worked to death.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: "I heard there's big trouble at the Konstantin Mine. That's probably why they're sending so many of us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "It's just a mine, isn't it... Shouldn't Task Force be handling this?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: "It is no ordinary mine—it's a tantalum mine. Intel says there's been a sudden Punishing virus outbreak. Several underground Norman Mining Corp tantalum labs have suffered heavy losses.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: "The Punishing virus has been around for so long... Why are they only reporting it now? Who knows what's really going on there...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: 'The job landed on us because this mission requires both rescue and scouting teams, and most of Task Force is still fighting the Corrupted on the surface.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: "See that newcomer there, the one with brown hair? She shouldn't even be here. She literally just got out of training.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Support Force Member B', 3: "Our captain would never have let her join if this wasn't an emergency, and if she didn't have a relative on the rescue team for the Konstantin Mine collapse...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bridget looks around nervously in the crowd.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Bridget... Over here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ruolin! What are you doing here? I thought you applied to transfer to Task Force?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "The application will take a while since it's an interdepartmental transfer with no special circumstances.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I heard you applied for this ground mission. I might not be as strong in combat as you are, but at least I'm familiar with Support Force's other operations...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Looks like we'll get to fight side by side again!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Yeah! And also with Instructor Trojan!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Instructor Trojan? Is she part of this mission, too?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'I saw her over there earlier... There!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The blue-haired Construct is fiddling with her assigned weapons.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Instructor Trojan!'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "...One of these days, I'll need to get rid of this flashy hair color.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png'}
{3: 'They quickly pack up and load all the supplies onto the transport aircraft.'}
{3: 'For this mission, Support Force will split into teams to enter different areas of the Konstantin Mine.'}
{3: 'It was no surprise that Trojan, Bridget, and Ruolin were assigned to the same team.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: '...So the mine never gave a reasonable explanation even after you went to Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "...Yeah. According to the rescue team's code of conduct, if anything happens to rescue workers, the responsible party must issue an accident report.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'But even after I sent a formal inquiry as a Support Force Construct from Babylonia, they still refused to respond.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's clear they're hiding a bigger secret, and revealing it would cause them more trouble than being investigated by a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Tch, heartless bastards.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I have a feeling whatever caused this "accident" this time also caused the previous collapse. The only difference is that this time, they lost control of the situation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I will find the truth of what happened to my parents. I refuse to let them fade into the darkness without a trace.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "Yeah! You're Bridget! I know you can do it!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Ruolin clenches her fists to show support while Trojan's face remains hidden in the shadows."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory926.jpg'}
{3: 'The Konstantin Mine was one of the early mines that Norman Mining Corp invested in.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory938.jpg'}
{3: 'The advancement of Construct Tech helped them see its true value and resulted in the construction of this massive underground tower.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory833.jpg'}
{3: "Even the most experienced Konstantin miners wouldn't dare claim to know each of the vast underground tunnels."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{3: 'With all residents evacuated from Konstantin Town, Support Force is left working in the dark, relying on the most basic methods for rescue and investigation.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Nearly all power to the mine was lost in the accidents, so the only lights are the dim glow of flashlights from Support Force members.'}
{3: 'The team is linked together in a single file by safety ropes to prevent anyone from getting separated.'}
{3: "The caves grow more expansive as they go deeper. They eliminate several Corrupted and continue slowly, relying only on a map from the mine's administrators."}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Bridget?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Ruolin?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Trojan?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Trojan?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Trojan's signature lazy voice finally comes through After several calls."}
{3: 'Underground communications are unstable, so they rely on calling each other to make sure no one falls behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '...I smell blood. Over here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The searchlight finds no survivors—only grotesque bloodstains that silently testify to the tragedy that had unfolded here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "These marks don't look like the work of a Corrupted...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ruolin crouches down to examine the fresh bloodstains more closely.'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'These are blood spatter from impact, gunshot wounds, and... over here—drag marks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Someone moved the bodies.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '...I knew something was off about this place.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Can you tell which way they went? The fresh blood might mean there are survivors.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'That way.', 4: '1'}
{3: "They all dash forward following Ruolin's direction."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory925.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Another thirty minutes pass. The squad leader slows down and starts another roll call.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Trojan...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Construct's voice rings through the deep, dark tunnel, trailing into an unsettling hum."}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "...Trojan, report in, or I'll have to cut your attendance points.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Trojan!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Construct's voice module almost produces a shriek, but there is no answer."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member C', 3: 'She... Trojan... Trojan is gone!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: '...What about the safety rope? Did she fall behind?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member C', 3: 'The safety rope... the safety rope...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Frantic rustling sounds fill the air as they fumble in the dark, reeling in the safety rope. Panic begins to spread.'}
{2: 'Support Force Member C', 3: "The safety rope... it's been cut!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Turn on the searchlights!', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0'}
{3: 'The searchlights that were dimmed to save energy, suddenly flare to full power, bathing the ground in light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member C', 3: 'There are traces of vital fluid... T-Trojan, did she...!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "That's impossible! Everyone, stay calm! Instructor Trojan is a seasoned fighter—no one could take her down without making any noise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Something's not right... I would like to request permission to head back to assist Trojan!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "Request denied. It's too dangerous and you're just a rookie. Split from the squad and you'll be dead before you know it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll follow the fluorescent markers we left along the way and cross-check with the map.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Twenty minutes. Give me twenty minutes. If I can't find Trojan in twenty minutes, I'll regroup immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'This is not a game.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I-I'll go with Bridget.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: '...You?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'I may not be a good fighter, but I can track your trail... and help Bridget catch back up with the squad...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "...Don't make me regret this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "Twenty minutes. Only twenty minutes. If you can't find her, catch up with us immediately.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget & Ruolin', 3: 'Yes, sir!', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory833.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Trojan is moving effortlessly through a dark, craggy tunnel, not even using the portable lamp issued by Support Force.'}
{3: 'No matter how much she dreads working, duty calls. She hopes her getaway was smooth enough to avoid raising suspicion among the squad.'}
{3: "As for her excuse for being in the lab... She could say she was kidnapped and fought her way out... They'd probably buy that, right?"}
{3: "What if Bridget comes looking for her? Oh, well, she won't be able to get past the authentication system and into the lab, anyway..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: '...How rude. They just had to blow up my shortcut.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Trojan avoids the collapsed shaft and takes a detour. She dusts off a control panel and activates the emergency power switch.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{2: 'System', 3: '—Authentication successful.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Well, at least these halfwits made a backup power system that actually works.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The door hidden behind the rocks slowly opens, revealing a dimly lit corridor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "Sigh. Don't say I don't care about my old colleagues...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'I mean, Kurono paid good money for this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With another sigh, she steps over several lifeless bodies and presses onward.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "They already killed pretty much everyone here... What's the point of making me come back... Huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Faint noises come from a laboratory ahead.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Oh? Did I miss one?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: "W-wait, wait! Goddammit! It's me!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trojan clicks her tongue in irritation, but keeps her gun trained on Hyde.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Why are you still... here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: 'Those Kurono ******* started spraying bullets the moment they got in! Luckily, I was quick enough to dodge back there.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: "Quick, get me out of here! I have all the data on the copolymers with me. Come with me—I promise, whatever I get, you'll get your share... Hey!", 4: '2'}
{3: "BANG! Smoke wisps from Trojan's gun barrel as Hyde clutches his bloody shoulder in shock."}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "That's your best offer for your life? Besides... why should I trust you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Hmm... Maybe this is an opportunity from God.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "I never thought I'd get this lucky when I took this mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: "Trojan! You vile rat! If it weren't for me, you'd have ******* rotted in that pile of corpses!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Perhaps? Though I may have preferred that.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She loads another bullet and aims once more at Hyde's head."}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: "Y-you can't kill me! Your frame... I modified your frame! If I die, you won't get away with it either!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Sigh... How can you still be so clueless?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Living or dead... makes no difference to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'I live... only to receive pointless missions like this, to have you rip apart, modify, and experiment on my frame... Maybe death is the sensible choice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'So... die here with me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The corners of her mouth twitch into a chilling smile.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Trojan! What are you doing?!'}
{3: 'Before the gunshot sounds, heavy footsteps echo from the hallway...'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '...****! Those ignorant idiots! How did they blow a hole over there...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4501_01.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'Blinding lights flood in.'}
{3: "This lab only had one entrance. There's only one way Bridget could have bypassed the authentication system—Kurono's soldiers must have accidentally blasted open a new path."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Lower your weapon! Trojan, who is this? Why are you pointing your gun at him?'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'His face pisses me off.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'By the way, are you sure you want to point your gun at me? I am your instructor.'}
{3: 'Trojan finds herself moving her gun away from Hyde, despite what she says.'}
{3: "She can't let Babylonia know about her real identity just yet."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyde', 3: "A-are you the rescue team from Babylonia? Oh, thank goodness! I-I'm just a researcher from Norman here to study tantalum ore!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Hyde cries out as if he's found salvation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Are you really just a researcher?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man sitting slumped on the ground darts his eyes back and forth. Guilt is written all over his face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hyde', 3: 'O-of course! Th-these are my identification documents...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He fumbles to fish out his access card and ID badge.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Humph, you don\'t strike me as "just a researcher."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'If you\'re "just a researcher", how do you explain all the bodies outside?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: 'The Constructs did it! They went haywire from the Punishing Virus! I-I had nothing to do with it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Oh, nothing to do with it? Then why were you acting so strange?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Could it be that you're the mastermind behind all this? Wouldn't surprise me one bit...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'A malicious smile spreads across Trojan\'s face as she emphasizes the word "mastermind".'}
{2: 'Hyde', 3: 'W-what are you saying? I... I understand why you might think I did it, but...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'These two seem to be putting on some kind of show. Did they really just run into each other...?'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "...Regardless of who this person is or what he did, Support Force does not have the authority to execute anyone. Instructor Trojan... you're violating Support Force protocols.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget carefully observes Trojan's reaction."}
{3: "She can't quite grasp what's going on, nor can she determine who is lying based on their brief exchange."}
{3: 'The best solution is to bring them both back to Babylonia and let the experts find the truth.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Instructor Trojan, hand your weapon over to Ruolin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She carelessly tosses her sidearm to the ground.'}
{3: "Things couldn't possibly get any worse than this—mission failed, Hyde is still alive, and now Bridget has found them."}
{3: 'There is one solution—she could set off the bombs beneath the lab and blow everyone to bits. That would tie up all loose ends.'}
{3: "But... they've done nothing wrong."}
{3: 'Regretting her infuriating indecision, Trojan steps back with a sigh.'}
